titleStmt.title: The Bloody bed-roll, or, Treason displayed in its scarlet colours being a discovery of the most notorious plotters and grand conspirators of a company of rebellious subjects not to be parallel'd in all ages : with a list of the names of the chief actors and the sentence of terrour pronounced against them for their treasonable designs.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford by L. Lichfield and re-printed at London for general satisfaction,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
